familyPreparednessTools.use_these_tools_to_ensure_your_1: Use these tools to ensure your family is prepared and knows what to do in emergency situations.
familyPreparednessTools.create_a_printable_guide_for_y_3: Create a printable guide for your family to follow in emergency situations.

tools.emergencySimulatorDesc: Run a practice drill. We'll send a test scenario to your family to see if they can find the information they need.
tools.stepByStepGuidesDesc: Generate printable, scenario-based guides for your family (e.g., 'What to do in the first 24 hours').
tools.treasureHuntDesc: A gamified quiz for your family to ensure they know key facts, like where to find the will or who your lawyer is.
tools.videoMessagesDesc: Record personal video messages for your loved ones to be unlocked in specific circumstances.

death.title: In case of my death
death.description: A comprehensive guide for handling immediate tasks after your passing

hospitalization.title: If I am hospitalized
hospitalization.description: Steps to take if you are incapacitated or in medical care

missing.title: If I go missing
missing.description: Critical information and contacts if you cannot be located

emergency.title: General emergency
emergency.description: Quick reference for any urgent situation

death.title: Emergency Guide: In Case of My Death
death.disclaimer: This guide was generated based on the information you've provided. Please ensure all details are kept up to date.

dialog.title: Log Communication
dialog.description: Record details of your communication with a beneficiary

placeholders.subject: Brief subject of the communication
placeholders.summary: Detailed summary of what was discussed

empty.title: No communications logged yet
empty.subtitle: Click 'Log Communication' to record your first interaction

emergencyAccess.modalDescription: This will grant you access to emergency contact information. Use this only in genuine emergency situations.
emergencyAccess.warningText: This access is logged and the account holder will be notified.
emergencyAccess.reasonPlaceholder: Please describe the emergency situation requiring access to contact information...
emergencyAccess.confirmCheckbox: I confirm this is a genuine emergency situation and I need access to contact information
emergencyAccess.pleaseConfirm: Please confirm the emergency and provide a reason
emergencyAccess.notAuthorized: You are not authorized for emergency access
emergencyAccess.accessGranted: Emergency access granted. Contact information is now available.
emergencyAccess.contactsDescription: Contact these people in priority order. Click phone numbers to call or emails to send messages.
emergencyAccess.importantNote: Important: Contact these individuals in the order shown. Always try the primary contact method first. Log all contact attempts for record keeping.

lowConfidence.primaryMessage: You're handling this situation with care and insight.
lowConfidence.supportingMessage: It shows you understand the importance of the task.
lowConfidence.actionableAdvice: Continue at your own comfortable pace.
lowConfidence.motivationalElement: Your thoughtful approach is a testament to your values.
lowConfidence.nextStepGuidance: When ready, proceed with the next important step to secure your family's future.

highOverwhelm.primaryMessage: Your dedication to your family is commendable.
highOverwhelm.supportingMessage: It's okay to take a moment to regroup.
highOverwhelm.actionableAdvice: Consider breaking the task into smaller parts for focus.
highOverwhelm.motivationalElement: Knowing you're driven by love and care.
highOverwhelm.nextStepGuidance: Each small action you take makes a significant difference.

default.supportingMessage: This effort strengthens your family's foundation.
default.motivationalElement: Every decision you make protects your loved ones.
default.nextStepGuidance: Seeing the big picture will guide your next steps.

lifeEvents.title: Life Events
lifeEvents.subtitle: Update your plan when major life changes occur
lifeEvents.addFirstEvent: Add your first life event to get started
lifeEvents.congratsMessage: Congratulations on your new child! Here are the recommended updates to your plan:

tasks.updateBeneficiariesDesc: Review and update beneficiaries on life insurance, retirement accounts, and bank accounts.
tasks.updateWillDesc: Ensure your will reflects your new marital status and beneficiary wishes.
tasks.reviewTrustsDesc: Make necessary changes to trust documents to reflect your new status.
tasks.updateEmergencyContactsDesc: Review and update emergency contacts in your Trusted Circle.
tasks.addChildRoster: Add your new child to your Trusted Circle
tasks.addChildRosterDesc: Include your child in your family information.
tasks.updateGuardian: Review and update the "Guardian" designation for your children
tasks.updateGuardianDesc: Ensure you have designated appropriate guardians for all your children.
tasks.reviewLifeInsurance: Review your life insurance policy to ensure coverage is adequate
tasks.reviewLifeInsuranceDesc: Consider increasing coverage to account for your growing family.
tasks.updateWillBeneficiary: Update your will to include your new child as a beneficiary
tasks.updateWillBeneficiaryDesc: Ensure your new child is properly included in your estate planning.
tasks.updatePropertyArmory: Update property information in your Vault
tasks.updatePropertyArmoryDesc: Add new property or remove sold property from your assets.
tasks.updateMortgageInfoDesc: Ensure all property-related documents are current.
tasks.reviewHomeownersInsuranceDesc: Update insurance policies to reflect your current properties.
tasks.updateNetWorthDesc: Reflect the change in your real estate holdings.
tasks.addBusinessAssetsDesc: Include your business as an asset with relevant details.
tasks.createSuccessionPlanDesc: Document what should happen to your business if something happens to you.
tasks.updateInsuranceDesc: Consider key person insurance and business liability coverage.
tasks.separatePersonalBusiness: Ensure personal and business assets are properly separated
tasks.separatePersonalBusinessDesc: Review the distinction between personal and business holdings.
tasks.removeDeceasedDesc: Remove the deceased person and reassign their responsibilities.
tasks.appointNewExecutor: Appoint a new executor/trustee if needed
tasks.appointNewExecutorDesc: If the deceased was your executor or trustee, designate a replacement.
tasks.updateBeneficiariesDesc2: Check if the deceased was a beneficiary on any accounts.

logLifeEvent.title: Log a Life Event
logLifeEvent.description: Select a major life change to generate a personalized checklist for updating your family's protection plan.

form.title: Log Life Event
form.description: Select a major life change to generate a personalized checklist
form.eventDescription: Choose the life event that best describes your current situation

checklist.title: Personalized Checklist
checklist.description: Based on your life event, here are the key items you should review and update:
